org.jetel.data.parser

Class AbstractParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.parser.AbstractParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parser
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractTextParser, BinaryDataParser, ByteBufferParser, CloverDataParser, CloverDataParser35, DataRecordGenerator, DBFDataParser, DelimitedDataParser, FixLenDataParser, LdapParser, SQLDataParser, XLSParser, XPathParser

    public abstract class AbstractParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements Parser
    Abstract implementation of Parser interface.

    • Method Detail

      • setReleaseDataSource

        public void setReleaseDataSource(boolean releaseDataSource)
        Description copied from interface: Parser
        If releaseInputSource is false, the previous input data source is not released (input stream is not closed). The input data source release is performing into the method 'setDataSource'. Default value is true.
        Specified by:
        setReleaseDataSource in interface Parser

      • releaseDataSource

        protected abstract void releaseDataSource()
        This method should close the previous data sources when switching to the next source.

      • setDataSource

        public void setDataSource(java.lang.Object inputDataSource)
                   throws java.io.IOException,
                          ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: Parser
        Sets input data source. Some of parsers allow to call this method repeatedly.
        Specified by:
        setDataSource in interface Parser
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if releasing of previous source failed
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • getPreferredDataSourceType

        public Parser.DataSourceType getPreferredDataSourceType()
        Description copied from interface: Parser
        Parser can request specific data source type, which is preferred to be passed into Parser.setDataSource(Object) method. This is intended just a hint for source provider, so other types of source should be expected.
        Specified by:
        getPreferredDataSourceType in interface Parser

      • isDirectReadingSupported

        public boolean isDirectReadingSupported()
        by default, parser do not support direct reading -i.e. reading serialized data
        Specified by:
        isDirectReadingSupported in interface Parser
        Returns:
        true if direct reading is possible

      • getNextDirect

        public int getNextDirect(CloverBuffer buffer)
                  throws JetelException
        Description copied from interface: Parser
        Reads the next serialized record into the provided buffer. The target buffer is cleared first.

        The position of the target buffer will be set to 0 and the limit will be set to the end of the serialized record.

        Returns 0 to indicate EOF. 1 on Success -1if direct reading can be performed for current data source

        Specified by:
        getNextDirect in interface Parser
        Returns:
        0 to indicate EOF. 1 on Success -1if direct reading can be performed for current data source
        Throws:
        JetelException
